summary: Replaces the hair of unique female NPCs with the Oblivion Hair Pack as well as refining some of the faces.
descriptionHtml:
[b] [color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [/b]  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22598] Oblivion Hair Pack Fixed [/url] by DragonAge7

[b][color=yellow] Introduction: [/color] [/b]
I decided to make the NPCs in Skyrim look a lot prettier by using the fixed version of the Oblivion Hair Pack by DragonAge7 (originally by radioragae)
Whilst doing this I also change the appearances of certain characters. Sorry if you want the vanilla appearances but I cba to change it back.

[b][color=yellow]Installation[/color][/b]
[list=1]
[*]First download the Oblivion Hair Pack Fixed (if not the mod will not work)
[*]Download with NMM or simply extract to Skyrim Data folder
[*]Make sure the mod is enabled in the Launcher
[/list]

[b][color=yellow] Conflicts & Notes [/color][/b]
Naturally this will conflict with other NPC hair replacing mods
Also, not tested personally, but it may conflict with mods that replace the appearance or style of Female NPCS (males should be fine)
Also you need the Fixed Hair Pack version, not the original mod.
To make the women look like the screenshots, you\'ll want [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563] Coverwomen [/url]

[b]I\'m NOT the creator of the hair pack version OR of the original mod!
Credits go to DragonAge7 (for the fixed version) and RadioRagae (for the original)[/b]
author: Dsacc
